channel.title: I know how to portforword and make ip servers
channel.description: okay so if u guys are worrying about portforwording well not now!! Becasue u got a tut. okay step1. u must have windows xp. step2. go to www.no-ip.com and sign up then go to host redirects make a host then leave every thing blank click create host step3.After u have an ip go to start menu then go to run. step4. put cmd in run enter then put ipconfig in the winodws enter u must have an enternet connections with another computer it will say ur default gateway and ip adreass type down those 2 on a piece of paper. step5.type ur default getaway on the enternet adrasss bar do not add www. or .com but add the dots for example 192.168.0.1 step6. then it will say to give ur username and password type in admin as the username leave pw blank if that doesnt work type admin for both step7. go to advance when u log in ur router now type ur ip name then under it type ur ip adreass for exeample 192.168.0.102 step8. forget about the aplication and computer name now go to ports type in 43594 in both and traffic type leave it at any. step9. save settings and ur done portforwording step10. now all u need is a source a source is a server download one on the forums of moparscape. have a nice day enjoy!

item.title: I know how to portforword and make ip servers
item.dc:creator: @fred123456 fred123456
item.description:
@fred123456 wrote:

okay so if u guys are worrying about portforwording well not now!! Becasue u got a tut. okay step1. u must have windows xp.
step2. go to www.no-ip.com and sign up then go to host redirects make a host then leave every thing blank click create host
step3.After u have an ip go to start menu then go to run.
step4. put cmd in run enter then put ipconfig in the winodws enter
u must have an enternet connections with another computer it will say ur
default gateway and ip adreass type down those 2 on a piece of paper.
step5.type ur default getaway on the enternet adrasss bar do not add www. or .com but add the dots for example 192.168.0.1
step6. then it will say to give ur username and password type in admin as the username leave pw blank if that doesnt work type admin for both
step7. go to advance when u log in ur router now type ur ip name then under it type ur ip adreass for exeample 192.168.0.102
step8. forget about the aplication and computer name now go to ports type in 43594 in both and traffic type leave it at any.
step9. save settings and ur done portforwording
step10. now all u need is a source a source is a server download one on the forums of moparscape. have a nice day enjoy!
